inclusion.criterion: Patients with sepsis or septic shock who received their first doses of antibiotics no
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Immunocompromised patients or who had high doses of corticosteroids
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Infections that required long-term treatment, regardless of the etiologic agent (e.g., bacterial endocarditis).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 25-year-old pregnant woman with sepsis and fever. No history of recurrent UTI or underlying disease.
